sentences.en: At the required level of visual verisimilitude, computer animation is costly.
sentences.cn: 要使电脑动画的视觉效果达到要求的逼真程度，花费会十分昂贵。

sentences.en: Demand picked up and a reprint was required last November.
sentences.cn: 由于需求量上升，去年11月，再版已是势在必行。

sentences.en: Further scans are required to confirm the diagnosis of an abnormality.
sentences.cn: 需要进一步扫描来确诊是否出现异常病变。

sentences.en: I was required to hold out my arms and flex my pectorals.
sentences.cn: 我被要求伸展手臂，收紧胸肌。

sentences.en: If you have a leaking tap, replace the washer or other components as required.
sentences.cn: 如果你有一个漏水的龙头，更换垫圈或者其他需要的零件。

sentences.en: If you require further information, you should consult the registrar.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要进一步的信息，你应该向注册主任咨询。

sentences.en: Interest is paid monthly. Three months' notice is required for withdrawals.
sentences.cn: 利息按月支付。提款须提前3个月通知银行。

sentences.en: It was exacting work and required all his patience.
sentences.cn: 工作很艰巨，需要他有极大的耐心。

sentences.en: Just how much kneading is required depends on the sort of flour.
sentences.cn: 需要揉多久取决于用哪种面。

sentences.en: She suffered from anaemia and even required blood transfusions.
sentences.cn: 她患有贫血症，甚至需要输血。

sentences.en: The amount required to redeem the mortgage was £358,587.
sentences.cn: 需要偿还的抵押贷款总计358,587英镑。

sentences.en: The demand generated by one factory required the construction of another.
sentences.cn: 一家工厂产生的需求使得必须再建造一家工厂。

sentences.en: The drive required going down a quite twisty road.
sentences.cn: 开车的话需要走一段非常蜿蜒曲折的下坡路。

sentences.en: The machine automatically downloads the required information to his or her fax.
sentences.cn: 机器能自动将需要的信息下载到传真机上。

sentences.en: The required technology is probably still two years off.
sentences.cn: 所需技术可能还要两年才能开发出来。

sentences.en: This isn't the kind of crisis that requires us to drop everything else.
sentences.cn: 这不是需要我们抛下其他一切的那种危机。

sentences.en: To minimize collateral damage maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量减低附带性破坏，轰炸须做到最大程度的精确。

sentences.en: Water each plant as often as required.
sentences.cn: 按要求经常给每一株植物浇水。

sentences.en: You have now added all of the required certificates.
sentences.cn: 现在，您已经添加了所有必需的证书。

words.tran_cn: 需要（require的过去式及过去分词形式）；要求

phrases.tran_cn: 应具备单据；单据要求；所需要的单据
预期收益率，要求投资盈率；所需回报率，要求报酬率

trans.tran_cn: 要求( require的过去式和过去分词 )，需要，想要，命令
trans.tran_en: If you require something or if something is required, you need it or it is necessary
